level.heading: Council hearing.
level.text: Three years from March 16, 2005, the Council committee having jurisdiction over the Department of Health shall hold a public hearing on the appropriateness of the requirements for anesthesiologist assistants imposed by the Act [D.C. Law 15-237].

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 15-237
level.text: For Law 15-237, see notes following ยง 3-1206.31.

level.heading: References in Text
level.text: The "Act", referred to in text, refers to Law 15-237.
